entry.title: Presentation at JFLA
entry.content:
# CAISAR featured during JFLA
The JFLA (French for _Journées Francophones des Langages Applicatifs_) is a yearly meeting of both academics and industrials that share a common interest on functional programming - and incidently, software verification.
Industry side, companies [OCamlpro](https://ocamlpro.com/fr/), [Mitshubishi Electric](https://fr.mitsubishielectric.com/fr/), [TrustInSoft](https://trust-in-soft.com/) were present. From the academia, people from [Formal Methods Laboratory](https://lmf.cnrs.fr/?lang=en), [ENSIIE](https://www.ensiie.fr/) and [INRIA](https://www.inria.fr/en) were attending.
We gave a 15-minute presentation of CAISAR, available [here (in French)]({{'/assets/Girard_Satabin_JFLA2023_CAISAR.pdf'|relative_url}}). The relevant publication is available [here (also in French)](https://hal.science/hal-03936881/document).
It was a real pleasure to receive constructive feedback, both by industrial and academic actors; as it will inform our current and future work on the platform.

entry.title: Release of the technical paper
entry.content:
# CAISAR's technical report
We are delighted to release CAISAR's technical report, available on [HAL](https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/view/index/docid/3687211).
